description: SpecIF represents the visible, i.e. the diagrams and the text, as well as the semantics of system specifications for model integration and model exchange.
title: JSON-Schema for SpecIF v1.0.0

_88properties.description: A list of properties of a resource or statement.

$eref.description: For change and configuration management; the first revision has 0 entries, a simple modification has 1 entry and the result of a merge has 2 entries.
An ISO-8601 dateTime string. For reduced accuracy, any number of values may be dropped, but only from right to left.

___changedAt.description: Without change information, the parent's change information applies.

oneOf.description: A string containing some text or a special value.
A list of items with text and language properties. Thus, the information can be given in multiple languages.

___language.description: An IETF language tag such as 'en', 'en-US, 'fr' or 'de'.

$eref.description: A property value according to the property class.
A globally unique revision tag with one or multiple blocks with alphanumeric characters separated by a special character [.:,;/-]. Sequential as well as branching/merging notations are possible.

oneOf.description: A string with a valid identifier; where the last revision (i.e. revision=0) is implied.
A key consisting of a globally unique identifier and a revision. No or an undefined revision means the latest revision of the identified item.

$eref.description: A unique key for a particular revision of an identifiable item, e.g. of a resource.

___class.description: Must be a member of propertyClasses. In addition, it must be listed in the propertyClasses of the parent's class.

oneOf.description: A string containing some text or a special value.
A list of items with text and language properties. Thus, the information can be given in multiple languages.

___language.description: An IETF language tag such as 'en', 'en-US, 'fr' or 'de'.

$eref.description: A property value according to the property class.

___title.description: The property's label; if missing, the title of the property's class is applied.

___value.description: If the value is unknown, omit the whole property. By default, the class' value applies.

oneOf.description: A string with a valid identifier of a model-element; where the last revision (i.e. revision=0) is implied.

___project.description: A string with a valid project identifier

___id.description: A string with a valid identifier of a model-element

items.description: A list of pointers to resources resp statements which have been merged to this one.

oneOf.description: A string with a valid identifier; where the last revision (i.e. revision=0) is implied.
A key consisting of a globally unique identifier and a revision. No or an undefined revision means the latest revision of the identified item.

$eref.description: A unique key for a particular revision of an identifiable item, e.g. of a resource.

___class.description: Must be a member of resourceClasses.

oneOf.description: A string containing some text or a special value.
A list of items with text and language properties. Thus, the information can be given in multiple languages.

___language.description: An IETF language tag such as 'en', 'en-US, 'fr' or 'de'.

$eref.description: A property value according to the property class.
A globally unique identifier.
